attributes.action: publicly reject calls from the european union to join the eurozone.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The president of the European Commission, Jose Manuel Barroso  expressed his belief that the UK is 'closer than ever' to joining the Eurozone on November 30th(http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/business/7757830.stm). This petition is to keep the pound as the UK's currency, despite the current economic crisis

rejection.details: We cannot accept petitions containing links to other websites.
